title: Bewitched
description: MR. APRILZach Connor: Self-imposed recluse, struggling to avoid one talkative woman and her precocious little girl.Kirstin Grams: Dedicated mother, resigned to single parenthood and loving Zach from afar.Jock: Rapscallion pirate ghost and self-declared matchmaker.Aye, there was something haunting Zach Connor. It was evident in the lad's eyes. And Jock knew that Kirstin was just the lass to replace Zach's loneliness with some fine and fierce passion. What these two stubborn mortals needed was a little help from fate -- and a little push from Jock.Those Connor brothers don't stand a chance of staying single -- once they cross the threshold and become Jock's Boys!MAN OF THE MONTH: HE KNOWS WHAT HE WANTS AND KNOWS HOW TO GET IT!
author: Jennifer Greene
